title: Ahi Steak Sandwich
summary: Ahi Steak Sandwich requires around 12 minutes from start to finish. This dairy free and pescatarian recipe serves 30 and costs $1.38 per serving. One portion of this dish contains approximately 7g of protein, 7g of fat, and a total of 108 calories. It will be a hit at your valentin day event. It is brought to you by latimes.com.
